thread.section_title: Ridestore omdömen | Kundernas egna tankar om Ridestore | www.ridestore.se
thread.title: Sebastian Bøje Sundvang
thread.title_full: Ridestore recenserad av Sebastian Bøje Sundvang

author: Sebastian Bøje Sundvang
title: Sebastian Bøje Sundvang
text: I ordered a ski jacket, which arrived a few days after I ordered it. It is just as described, and one thing I think is amazing about ridestore.se is their great size guide, where you just have to give some details about your body, and then you get a percent size, which tells you which size you probably should by, and which size you 'could' by. Credit to ridestore.se.
